description:
(Found in Collection, 7/25/95)
Twelve strips of leather cut from one piece are jined at the top. There is one seperate piece that has two joined strips, broken off from the large ppiece. There is another set that was broken off, but then tied by one strips end to the top of the larger piece. One clear bead rests near the top on the fifth strip from the left. Object possibly linked to pipe bag RBL74.9.5
title: Long Leather Fringe with One Clear Bead
